title: Best of The Program | 3/10/20
description:
Today’s coronavirus update: deaths are way lower than the swine flu and the CDC recommends that people 60 years or older stay home – or DOES it? Pat Gray joins to talk about the latest tool law enforcement uses to turn the justice system upside down. The 2020 race has narrowed to two old white men. Michigan is up for grabs tonight and Bernie Sanders may lose badly to Joe Biden, but Democrats have forgotten about Tulsi Gabbard, the only female and minority in the race. And Biden is in trouble after a business connected to his brother was raided by the FBI.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
